entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023
